title: Exquisite Neelam Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: Crafted in high-quality white gold with a fine Hyderabadi polish. Features brilliant-cut diamonds of exceptional clarity and seven vibrant blue sapphires (Neelam/నీలం) totaling 13.16 carats.
features: This breathtaking Haaram showcases a sophisticated design with a central floral motif radiating outwards. Delicate diamond settings surround each sapphire, enhancing its natural brilliance. The intricate detailing and graceful curves reflect traditional South Indian craftsmanship blended with modern aesthetics.
colors: The striking contrast of dazzling white diamonds and deep blue sapphires creates a captivating color palette. The white gold setting further accentuates the brilliance of the stones.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vyaahamu/వివాహము)
or milestone celebrations. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to formal events and upscale gatherings.
description: This Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The high-quality diamonds and sapphires ensure lasting beauty and value. A true heirloom piece that embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry design with a contemporary appeal, making it a perfect investment and a cherished addition to your collection.
